## Ironman Tulsa run start/finish 2023 

```{r map, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)

df <- data.frame(lat = runif(20, min = 39.2, max = 39.3),
                 lng = runif(20, min = -76.6, max = -76.5))

df <- data.frame(lat = 36.136767, 
                 lng = -96.263260)

my_map <- df %>%
    leaflet() %>% 
    addTiles() %>% 
    addMarkers()
my_map

```
